trigger: Parking orbit apogee < 90 nm or perigee < 80 nm
immediate_effect: CSM state vector unsafe for TLI
TLI burn starts without updated PAD
recovery_actions: Execute MCC-1 earlier; uplink revised PAD

trigger: Δv shortfall > 10 m/s at TLI shutdown
recovery_actions: Plan corrective burn at next communications window

trigger: LM hard dock not confirmed by GET 003:45:00
ongoing_penalty: RCS prop usage +10 lb/hr while redocking
recovery_actions: Recycle docking sequence; verify capture latches

immediate_effect: Cryo boiloff trending +0.5 lb/hr per tank
recovery_actions: Engage PTC and shed non-critical loads
